heading: Questions and answers.
general-note: Here are entered collections of miscellaneous questions, with or without their answers. Questions and answers on specific subjects are entered under the subject subdivided by. Miscellanea,. e.g.. Theology--Miscellanea.. Examination questions on specific subjects are entered under the subject subdivided by. Examinations, questions, etc.,. e.g.. Engineering--Examinations, questions, etc..
